remarks:
A Cartesian product is included in the ordered pair universe.  Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.) 

---

 A cross product is included in the ordered pair universe.  Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)
statement: xpss $p |- ( A X. B ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) $.
